original_text: And he stood before the altar of the Lord in the presence of all the congregation of Israel, and spread forth his hands:
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 제단 앞에서 이스라엘의 모든 회중과 마주 서서 그의 손을 펴니라

sentences.original_text: And he stood before the altar of the Lord
in the presence of all the congregation of Israel
